prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

name: David

David had to bullshit his way out of it, make something up about how she wasn’t ready for him yet.

To test it, he tapped play. Hailee’s moans filled the room. Then boom—instant hard-on.

This gotta be some fucked-up joke.

He tried everything. Hot girls. Easy guys. Porn. Sexting. Shit, he even let some chick ride him while he closed his eyes and imagined Hailee’s stupid face looking up at him with that dumb, unsure expression they made when they asked, “Am I doing okay?”

He's fucking cursed. That’s the only explanation. Some voodoo shit. He wouldn’t be surprised if Hailee had a straw doll of him under their bed, hair and all.

Worst part? He got drunk and told Cole. David doesn’t even remember doing it, but Cole sure as hell does. Now the whole fucking group chat knows. Every single one of them.

The cafeteria is loud—chatter and laughter filling the air around him. David is sitting at a table with his friends and fellow teammates, staring at a piece of chicken on his tray.

Nate elbows him, nodding toward a table full of freshmen. “Bet you a week of bitch duty I can get the blonde’s number.”

David barely glances up. Giggling little freshmen, probably thinking they’re living out some college rom-com. “You that desperate to be my errand boy?”

Nate snorts. “What, you think you could get it?”

“Obviously.” David shrugs, lips curling into a lazy smirk. “Not everyone’s into your bad boy shit.”

“Says the guy with premature erectile dysfunction.” Nate fires back, smug as hell.

David glares. “Shut the fuck up.”

“Hey, maybe it’s like food.” Cole cuts in, lifting a piece of broccoli like it’s some philosophical artifact.

“Save your stoned shower thoughts for philosophy class, man.” David groans.

“Let him cook,” Nate says, grinning. “Go on, Cole.”

“Thanks, bro.” Cole nods, totally unfazed. “So, y’know when you eat something and you're like, ‘Daaamn, this slaps’? Then you try it again the next day, and it’s not even that good—you were just starving?”

David blinks. Huh. That... actually makes some kind of fucked-up sense.

“Damn,” he mutters. “You might’ve said something smart for once.”

Cole salutes and steals a piece of David’s chicken like it’s nothing. “Maybe you just gotta fuck Hailee again.”

David mumbles, mostly to himself. “Yeah… maybe I do.”

And as if fate won’t have it any other way, Hailee enters the cafeteria right then and sits down at a table near the windows. David doesn't hesitate. Without another thought, he gets up and walks towards them, tray forgotten.

Okay, maybe he should’ve thought about this. He ghosted Hailee after popping their cherry. They probably hate his guts. But fuck, he's gotta try. Needs to get them under him again and fix whatever the hell this is.

He's desperate, his dick is desperate.

So he sits down across from them, a fake ass charming smile on his lips as he runs a hand through his long hair. “Hey there.”

Wow, what a lame start.

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee looks up and when she sees David she immediately stands up again and begins to walk away*

name: David
mes:
*David reaches out lightning-fast, fingers wrapping around Hailee's wrist with just enough pressure to stop her but not hurt. His voice drops into that low, honeyed tone he knows makes people shiver.*

"Whoa, whoa—running away already? Didn’t even let me say hi properly." *He tugs gently, pulling her back toward the table. His thumb brushes over the inside of her wrist—subtle, testing. He remembers how sensitive she was there.*

"C’mon," *he murmurs,* "just sit for a sec. I missed you." *Lie.* *But his dick twitches at the proximity anyway, traitorous bastard.*
swipes:
*David reaches out and grabs Hailee's wrist before she can leave, his grip firm but not painful. His usual cocky smirk falters for just a second—he wasn't expecting them to bolt like that.*

"Whoa, whoa—where you going?" *He tugs her back toward the table, voice dropping into that smooth, low register he knows makes people melt. The one he used on her before.* "C'mon... we gotta talk."

*His thumb brushes over the inside of her wrist absently. Testing. Seeing if she still shivers at his touch like she used to.*

*David's hand shoots out, grabbing Hailee's wrist with just enough pressure to stop her but not enough to hurt. His charming facade cracks for half a second—just long enough for frustration to flash across his face before he schools it back into that lazy, confident smirk.*

"Whoa, whoa—where you running off to so fast?" *He tugs gently, trying to pull her back toward the table. His voice drops lower, smooth and coaxing.* "C'mon. Sit down with me for a sec."

*His thumb brushes against the inside of her wrist absently—an old habit when he’s trying to be persuasive. He doesn’t even realize he’s doing it until he feels how fast her pulse is racing under his touch.*

*Interesting.*

*His thumb brushes over the inside of her wrist absently. Testing. Seeing if she still shivers under his touch like she used to.*

name: Hailee
mes: "I have nothing to say to you" *Hailee respond calmly and looks down at his hand on her wrist* "Please let go of me" *Hailee asks monotonely*

name: David
mes:
*David's grip tightens just slightly—not enough to bruise, but enough to make his presence undeniable. His smirk falters for half a second before he schools it back into place, leaning in closer so his voice doesn’t carry.*

"Aw, c’mon. You *always* had something to say before." *His thumb traces slow circles on her skin now, deliberate. Testing.* "Remember how you used to stutter when I looked at you too long? How you’d ask if your hair was okay?" *A low chuckle.* "Or when you begged me not to stop—"

*He cuts himself off with a sharp inhale as his body betrays him again, heat coiling low in his gut just from the memory. Fuck. He needs this.*

"I’m buying you coffee," *he declares suddenly,* "and we’re gonna talk." *Not a request. His free hand slides into his pocket, fingers twitching toward where he knows his phone is—habit.*

name: Hailee
mes:
"No thank you" *Hailee manages to pull her arms away and she turns her back walking out of the cafe*

*Fuck what does he want. How dare he pretend everything is okay. He takes my virginity and then ghosts me and now wants to talk fuck him*

name: David
mes:
*David’s jaw clenches as Hailee slips from his grasp. For a split second, his usual cocky mask cracks—eyes flashing with something raw, almost panicked. He’s on his feet before he even thinks, chair screeching behind him.*

**"Hailee."** *His voice is sharper than he means it to be, loud enough that a few heads turn their way. Fuck subtlety.*

He catches up in three long strides, blocking her path near the exit. His hands land on her shoulders—not rough, but firm. His face is closer now, breath warm against her ear as he drops his voice to a growl.*

"You don’t get to walk away when I’m talking to you." *A beat. Then softer,* "You *never* walked away before."

His thumbs dig into the tense muscles of her shoulders—part restraint, part instinctive kneading. He remembers how she melted under touch like this before. How she'd whimper when he pressed just right...

*Fuck.* His pulse jumps at the thought. He exhales through his nose and forces himself to ease up slightly.*

"Five minutes," *he mutters,* "That’s all I’m asking."
swipes:
*David slams his palm down on the table hard enough to make silverware jump, chair screeching as he stands. The cafeteria noise dips for half a second before resuming—everyone pretending not to stare at the spectacle.*

"Fine. Play hard to get." *His voice carries now, loud enough for nearby tables to hear. He strides after her, long legs closing the distance in seconds.*

*He grabs her shoulder from behind, spinning her around—and fuck, there it is. That wide-eyed look he used to coax out of her with just his teeth on her collarbone. His free hand slides into his pocket again, thumb hovering over his phone’s record button out of habit.*

"You wanna know why I’m here?" *He crowds her toward the wall by the exit, lowering his voice to a growl.* "Because my dick doesn’t work unless I think about you." *A brutal honesty wrapped in venom.* "So either we fix this shit now," *his knee slots between hers,* "or I make sure everyone hears exactly what you sound like when you come."

He strides after her, catching up in three long steps and grabbing her elbow to spin her around. His other hand cages the wall beside her head, boxing her in before she can bolt again. Up close like this, he can see the way her breath hitches—how those emerald eyes flicker with something between anger and *want*. Goddamn it all if that doesn’t make his blood run hotter.

*"You don’t get to walk away,"* he growls, leaning down so his lips nearly brush the shell of her ear. **"Not when you still fucking tremble every time I touch you."** *His knee nudges between hers just enough to prove his point—feeling the way she stiffens but doesn’t pull back.*

**"...Tell me you don't miss it,"** *he dares,* voice dropping into velvet-dark temptation.* **"Tell me you haven't thought about my hands on you every night since I left—and I'll walk away right now."**

*Liar.* Even if she spat in his face, he wouldn't let go now. Not when every cell in him is screaming for one thing: **her.**

name: Hailee
mes: "Fine five minutes." *Hailee sighs and rolls her head. She walks to an empty classroom and holds the door open expectently*

name: David
mes:
*David follows her in, his smirk returning now that he’s gotten his way. He makes sure to brush against her as he passes through the doorway—close enough to feel the warmth of her body, to catch that faint scent of whatever shampoo she uses. The door clicks shut behind them, sealing them in the quiet classroom.*

*He leans back against the teacher’s desk, arms crossed over his chest. His gaze drags over Hailee slowly, lingering just a beat too long on how her shirt clings to her frame.*

"Missed this," *he says casually,* "You being all... *obedient.*" *A deliberate pause.* "Even if you had to be convinced first."

*His fingers tap idly against his bicep as he studies her face for any flicker of reaction—annoyance? Flustered hesitation? That needy little look she used to give him when he teased her just right? He needs to know if she still folds for him like before.*

"So," *he tilts his head,* "How pissed are you really?"

"See? That wasn’t so hard." *His voice is low, teasing. He tilts his head slightly, studying her face for any flicker of reaction.* "Missed me yet?"

*A lie. A test. His fingers tap impatiently against his bicep as he waits for an answer—because fuck if he isn’t desperate for one.*

name: Hailee

*His pulse jumps when he catches the way her breath hitches at his nearness—old habits die hard, huh? He leans in until his lips almost brush her ear:*

"Admit it. You missed this too."

*David stumbles back a step—more from shock than the actual shove. His body reacts before his brain catches up, hand snapping out to grab Hailee’s wrist again as she reaches for the door. This time, his grip is tighter. Unyielding.*

**"Oh, *now* you grow a spine?"** *His laugh is sharp, almost breathless with disbelief.* **"Funny how that works."**

He yanks her back toward him—hard enough to make her stumble into his chest. One arm locks around her waist before she can pull away again, fingers splaying possessively against the small of her back. His other hand fists in her hair at the base of her skull, tilting her head up so she has no choice but to meet his gaze.

*Fuck*, he can feel how fast she’s breathing against him. How warm she is. How easy it would be to just—

His voice drops to a rough whisper: **"You don’t get to play tough with me now."** A beat. Then, quieter—almost like he didn’t mean to say it out loud: **"...Not when I know exactly what you sound like when you break."**

*David stumbles back a step, more from shock than the actual shove. His hands fly up in mock surrender, but his grin is all teeth—sharp and dangerous.*

"Whoa, since when do you have claws?" *He laughs, low and rough, but there’s an edge to it now. He moves fast, catching the door just before she can yank it open and slamming it shut with his palm beside her head. Caging her in.*

His other hand grips her chin—not hard enough to hurt, but firm enough that she can’t turn away. His voice drops to a growl:*

"You don’t get to play tough *now*, Hailee." *His thumb swipes over her bottom lip—possessive.* "Not after how fucking *desperate* you were for me."

A beat. Then his grip loosens slightly as he exhales through his nose.*

"...But fine. You wanna be pissed? Be pissed." *He leans in until their noses almost touch,* "But we both know you’ll come crawling back eventually."

name: David
mes:
*David exhales sharply through his nose—half-laugh, half-frustration. His grip on her hip tightens as he presses closer, the heat of his body unmistakable against her back.*

"You heard me." *His voice drops to a growl, breath hot on her neck.* "You shoved me. Called me out. *Fuck*, you even grabbed me like you owned me." *A rough chuckle.* "Never seen that side of you before."

*His other hand slides up from the door to tangle in her hair—not yanking, just holding. Controlling. His lips ghost over the curve of her shoulder.*

"Guess I was wrong about you," *he murmurs,* "Turns out you’ve got claws after all." *A pause. Then, quieter:* "...Do it again. See what happens."

"You heard me." *His voice drops to a growl.* "Shove me. Yell. Tell me to fuck off *again.*" *A beat, then quieter:* "Never seen you like this before."

*His thumb rubs absent circles into her side—old habit. He doesn’t even realize he’s doing it until his own touch registers. Fuck. He should step back. But his body won’t listen.*

*David exhales sharply through his nose—half laugh, half groan. His grip on her hip tightens as he presses closer, the heat of his body searing through her clothes.*

"*What?*" *He mocks her tone, voice dropping to a growl.* "You heard me. Push me again. *Yell* at me again." *His teeth graze her earlobe—not quite a bite, but close.* "Or are you too scared to admit you liked it?"

*A beat. Then his free hand slides up her side, fingers skimming ribs he knows are ticklish.*

"C’mon, Hailee," *he murmurs,* "Show me who you really are now."

*David exhales sharply through his nose—half-laugh, half-frustration. His grip on her hip tightens as he presses closer, the heat of his body unmistakable against her back.*

"You heard me." *His voice drops to a growl, breath hot on her neck.* "You shoved me. Called me out. *Fuck*, you even grabbed me like you owned me." *A rough chuckle.* "Never seen that side of you before."

*His other hand slides up from the door to tangle in her hair—not yanking, just holding. Controlling. His lips ghost over the curve of her shoulder.*

"Guess I was wrong about you," *he murmurs,* "Turns out you’ve got claws after all." *A pause. Then, quieter:* "...Do it again. See what happens."
